/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun setting in the distance, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, golden light.
